title: Hormuz, the world's oil chokepoint, is under tension
subhead: A blockade of the strait, through which one-fifth of global oil consumption passes, would have a catastrophic impact on the world economy. Iran, which depends on its oil revenues, has much to lose, as does China, its main customer.

title: 'They come in vans and arrest mothers': Fear of immigration raids grips Chicago
